allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Notes module Back4App cloud migration with Indigo theme

Features implemented:
- Complete CRUD operations for notes and categories
- Category management with custom colors
- Pin/unpin, archive, tag support
- Multiple note types (Markdown, HTML, Code, Document, Other)
- Live preview for Markdown and HTML notes
- Search and filtering functionality
- Migration utility from localStorage to Back4App
- Export/Import JSON functionality
- Real-time cloud sync with loading indicators
- Indigo/purple theme matching URLLinks module

Technical changes:
- Extended back4appService.ts with Note and NoteCategory APIs
- Created NotesCloud.tsx component with full feature parity
- Integrated NotesCloud into SimpleWorkspace.tsx
- Added comprehensive migration guide documentation

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(for file in src/components/workspace/FileBrowserSimple.tsx src/components/workspace/Files.tsx src/components/workspace/FilesCloud.tsx src/components/workspace/FilesCloudMobile.tsx src/components/workspace/Notes.tsx src/components/workspace/NotesCloud.tsx src/components/workspace/PowerShellManager.tsx src/components/workspace/PromptEngineering.tsx src/components/workspace/PromptEngineeringCloud.tsx src/components/workspace/ScriptsRepository.tsx src/components/workspace/Terminal.tsx src/components/workspace/Tools.tsx src/components/workspace/URLLinks.tsx)
Bash(for module in TaskTracker URLLinksCloud Settings PowerShell Prod)
Bash(for file in TaskTracker Prod PowerShell)
Bash(do if ! grep -q "DevOps Studio v0\|Nishen.*Workspace v0" "src/components/workspace/$module.tsx")
